SELECT m_prj_standup.id, m_prj_standup.sAccountId, m_prj_standup.projectId, m_prj_standup.forday, m_prj_standup.logBy, m_prj_standup.createdTime, m_prj_standup.lastUpdatedTime, m_prj_standup.whatlastday, m_prj_standup.whattoday, m_prj_standup.whatproblem, concat(s_user.firstname, ' ', s_user.lastname) AS logByFullName, s_user.avatarId AS logByAvatarId, m_prj_project.shortName AS projectShortName FROM m_prj_standup LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user ON ( m_prj_standup.logBy=s_user.username) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_prj_project ON (m_prj_standup.projectId=m_prj_project.id)

SELECT m_prj_project.id AS projectId, m_prj_project.shortname AS projectKey, m_prj_project.name AS projectName, m_prj_project.avatarId AS projectAvatarId, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM m_prj_standup WHERE m_prj_standup.projectId = m_prj_project.id AND CAST(m_prj_standup.forday AS DATE) = @{_parameter.onDate}) AS totalWrittenReports, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM m_prj_member WHERE m_prj_member.projectId = m_prj_project.id AND m_prj_member.status = 'Active') AS totalReports FROM m_prj_project WHERE m_prj_project.id IN #repeat(${_parameter.projectIds} $projectId "," "(" ")") @{projectId} #end ORDER BY projectName

SELECT s_user.username, s_user.firstname, s_user.lastname, s_user.avatarId FROM s_user, m_prj_member WHERE m_prj_member.status = 'Active' AND m_prj_member.username = s_user.username AND m_prj_member.projectId = @{_parameter.projectId} AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM m_prj_standup WHERE m_prj_standup.projectId = @{_parameter.projectId} AND CAST(m_prj_standup.forday AS DATE) = @{_parameter.onDate} AND m_prj_standup.logBy = s_user.username) = 0
